guest.name: Gina Gotthilf
guest.title: Co-founder & COO, Latitud (Former VP of Growth at Duolingo)
guest.background: Gina Gotthilf is the co-founder of Latitud, a company building the operating system for tech startups in Latin America. Previously, she led growth and marketing at Duolingo, taking the user base from 3 million to 200 million mostly through organic channels, and worked on the Mike Bloomberg presidential campaign.
guest.background_zh: Gina Gotthilf 是 Latitud 的联合创始人兼首席运营官，致力于打造拉丁美洲科技初创企业的操作系统。此前，她曾担任 Duolingo 的增长与营销副总裁，主要通过有机增长渠道将用户群从 300 万扩展至 2 亿，并曾参与迈克·布隆伯格的总统竞选团队。

episodeSummary: Gina shares the untold stories behind Duolingo's massive organic growth, emphasizing the power of brand voice and retention over paid acquisition. She discusses her philosophy on career resilience ('A-side vs. B-side'), insights from managing digital ad budgets for the Bloomberg campaign, and strategies for scaling products internationally without drowning in complexity.
episodeSummary_zh: Gina 分享了 Duolingo 巨大有机增长背后的不为人知的故事，强调了品牌声音和留存率优于付费获客的重要性。她探讨了关于职业韧性的哲学（“A面与B面”），分享了管理布隆伯格竞选团队数字广告预算的见解，以及如何在不陷入复杂性的情况下实现产品国际化扩展的策略。
